name: The Edge Of The World Z (Will Shock You)
name_original: The Edge Of The World Z (Will Shock You)
description:
THIRD PERSON SCI FI SHOOTER GAME(SINGLE
PLAYER AND MULTIPLAYER) ,COLLECT WEAPONS AND FRIENDS TO FIGHT, AND SURVIVE AND SAVE THE WORLD. THAT HAVE BEEN CAPTURED BY SCI FI ENEMIES , COMPLETE MISSION AND LOT OF LEVELS(FROM EASY TO HARD)
THIS GAME CONTAIN ARENA AND SPECIAL STORY ;-)




*SINGLE PLAYER:
-STORY IN THE BIGGNING AND IN THE END OF THE GAME
-LEVEL SYSTEM FROM EASY TO HARD
-FANTASTIC GRAPHIC
-MISSION SYSTEM

*ARENA OF DEATH:
-FIGHT ENEMIES IN ROUNDS(ROUNDS GO FROM EASY TO HARD)

MULTIPLAYER P vs P AND CHATBOX
